titleStmt.title: The lamentatle [sic] death of the Earle of Bucquoy, Generall of the Emperours army Happened vnto him in an honorable exploit, before the towne of Newheufel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Rocolet [i.e. E. Allde],

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false; printed at London by E. Allde (STC).
The misprint on the title page is corrected in MS. in most copies.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
